data.actual_result: Discord flickers for a second when opening the app
data.expected_result: Discord should open normally without any flickering
data.short_description: reopening the app will cause it to flicker for a second if minimized while a gif is in full screen (can take 2-3 tries)
data.steps_to_repro: - click on any gif to play it in full screen  - minimize the app by clicking on the home button - reopen the app from your recent apps  - notice how the screen flashes for a second
